alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 3:19PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 745 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 315 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the island due to showers with moderate rain likely through the day. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. Due to the amount of rainfall over the past several days, this additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
